00013 VehicleDrawWindow::VehicleDrawWindow(Controller m,int x,int y,int w,int h,const char *lab):Fl_Widget(x,y,w,h,lab)
00014 {
00015         this->placing = "";
00016         pointNumber = 0;
00017         controller = m;
00018         radius=5;
00019         file = "NONE";
00020         MouseX = Fl::event_x();
00021         MouseY = Fl::event_y();
00022         xPos = x;
00023         yPos = y;
00024         wPos = w;
00025         hPos = h;
00026         size =100;
00027         dragging = false;
00028         connecting = false;
00029         notConnector=false;
00030         firstPoint = false;
00031         margin = 5;
00032         numPoints = 8;
00033         int x1 = xPos+size;
00034         int y1 = yPos+size;
00035         int x2 = x1+wPos-(2*size);
00036         int y2 = y1+hPos-(2*size);
00037         int vertSpacing = (y2-y1)/(numPoints-1);
00038         // left vert circles
00039         this->addVertPoints(x1,y1, vertSpacing,1);
00040         // right vert circles
00041         this->addVertPoints(x2,y1, vertSpacing,3);
00042         // top horiz circles
00043         this->addHorizPoints(x1+vertSpacing,y1,vertSpacing,2);
00044         // top horiz circles
00045         this->addHorizPoints(x1+vertSpacing,y2,vertSpacing,4);
00046 }//VehicleDrawWindow

00052 int VehicleDrawWindow::handle(int event)
00053 {
00054         if(event==FL_PUSH){
00055                 int pn = checkPoint(Fl::event_x(),Fl::event_y());
00056                 if(pn == -1){
00057                         this->placing = "";
00058                         return 1;
00059                 }
00060         }
00061         // placing a connector
00062         if(connecting == true){
00063                 // mouse pressed
00064                 if(event==FL_PUSH){
00065                         // first point already set
00066                         if(firstPoint == true){
00067                                 vector<LineSegment> newShape;
00068                                 int pn = checkPoint(Fl::event_x(),Fl::event_y());
00069                                 if(pn != -1){
00070                                         newShape.push_back(LineSegment(snapPoints.at(pn).getX(),snapPoints.at(pn).getY(),prevPoint.getX(),prevPoint.getY(), snapPoints.at(pn).pointNumber, prevPoint.pointNumber));
00071                                         if(notConnector == true){
00072                                                 this->shapes.push_back(Shape(newShape,Point2D(0,0,FL_RED,1,0),"notconnector")); 
00073                                                 fl_cursor(FL_CURSOR_ARROW);
00074                                         }else{
00075                                                 this->shapes.push_back(Shape(newShape,Point2D(0,0,FL_GREEN,1,0),"connector"));
00076                                                 fl_cursor(FL_CURSOR_ARROW);
00077                                         }
00078                                         firstPoint = false;
00079                                         connecting = false;
00080                                         notConnector = false;
00081                                         this->placing = "";
00082                                         this->redraw();
00083                                 }
00084 
00085                         }else{ // create first point
00086                                 int pn = checkPoint(Fl::event_x(),Fl::event_y());
00087                                 if(pn != -1){
00088                                         prevPoint.setX(snapPoints.at(pn).getX());
00089                                         prevPoint.setY(snapPoints.at(pn).getY());
00090                                         prevPoint.pointNumber = snapPoints.at(pn).pointNumber;
00091                                         firstPoint = true;
00092                                         this->placing = "Choose Second Point";
00093                                         this->redraw();
00094                                 }
00095                         }
00096                 }
00097         }
00098         // not placing a connector
00099         if(connecting == false){
00100                 // mouse pressed
00101                 if(event==FL_PUSH){
00102                         // waiting for shape to be added
00103                         if(dragging){
00104                                 int point = checkPoint(Fl::event_x(),Fl::event_y());
00105                                 // add shape if a snap point was clicked
00106                                 if(point!=-1){
00107                                         this->addShape(snapPoints.at(point));
00108                                         dragging = false;
00109                                         this->placing = "";
00110                                         this->redraw();
00111                                 }
00112                         }else{
00113                                 int point = checkPoint(Fl::event_x(),Fl::event_y());
00114                                 if(point!=-1){
00115                                         this->resetPoints(snapPoints);
00116                                         snapPoints.at(point).setColor(FL_RED);
00117                                         this->redraw();
00118                                 }else{
00119                                         this->resetPoints(snapPoints);
00120                                         this->redraw();
00121                                 }
00122                                 dragging = false;
00123                         }
00124                         dragging = false;
00125                         this->placing = "";
00126                         fl_cursor(FL_CURSOR_ARROW);
00127                         this->redraw();
00128                 }
00129 
00130         }
00131         return 1;
00132 }//handle

00134 void VehicleDrawWindow::draw(void)
00135 {
00136 
00137         // background box
00138         fl_draw_box(FL_FLAT_BOX, xPos, yPos, wPos, hPos, FL_BACKGROUND_COLOR);
00139         // border around box
00140         fl_frame("AAAA", xPos, yPos, wPos, hPos);
00141         fl_frame("AAAA", xPos+size, yPos+size, wPos-(2*size), hPos-(2*size));
00142         this->drawPoints(snapPoints);
00143         //vector<Shape> shapes = this->getShapes();
00144         fl_draw(this->placing.c_str(), xPos+50, yPos+50);
00145         for(int i=0; i < shapes.size(); i++)
00146         {
00147                 Shape s = shapes.at(i);
00148                 Point2D point = s.location;
00149                 vector<LineSegment> lines = s.getShape();
00150 
00151                 for(int y=0; y < lines.size(); y++){
00152                         LineSegment line = lines.at(y);
00153 
00154 
00155                         if(s.name == "connector" || s.name=="notconnector"){
00156                                 if(s.name == "connector"){
00157                                 //fl_color(s.location.color);
00158                                         fl_color(FL_BLUE);
00159                                 }else{
00160                                         fl_color(FL_RED);
00161                                 }
00162                                 fl_line(line.getx1(), line.gety1(), line.getx2(), line.gety2());
00163                         }else{
00164                                 fl_color(FL_BLACK);
00165                                 // top
00166                                 if(point.direction == 2){
00167                                         fl_line(point.getX()-line.getx1(), point.getY()-line.gety1(), point.getX()-line.getx2(), point.getY()-line.gety2());
00168                                 }
00169                                 // left
00170                                 if(point.direction == 1){
00171                                         fl_line(point.getX()-line.gety1(), point.getY()-line.getx1(), point.getX()-line.gety2(), point.getY()-line.getx2());
00172                                 }
00173                                 // right
00174                                 if(point.direction == 3){
00175                                         //fl_draw(s.name.c_str(), point.getX()+8, point.getY()+5);
00176                                         fl_line(point.getX()+line.gety1(), point.getY()+line.getx1(), point.getX()+line.gety2(), point.getY()+line.getx2());
00177                                 }
00178                                 // bottom
00179                                 if(point.direction == 4){
00180                                         //fl_draw(s.name.c_str(), point.getX()-5, point.getY()+16);
00181                                         fl_line(point.getX()+line.getx1(), point.getY()+line.gety1(), point.getX()+line.getx2(), point.getY()+line.gety2());
00182                                 }
00183                         }
00184                 }
00185         }
00186 }//draw

00188 void VehicleDrawWindow::addVertPoints(int xStart, int yStart, int yTick, int side)
00189 {
00190         for(int i=0; i < numPoints; i++){
00191                 snapPoints.push_back(Point2D(xStart,yStart,FL_BLACK,side, pointNumber++));
00192                 yStart+=yTick;
00193         }
00194 }//drawVertPoints
00195 
00196 void VehicleDrawWindow::addHorizPoints(int xStart, int yStart, int xTick, int side)
00197 {
00198         for(int i=0; i < (numPoints-2); i++){
00199                 snapPoints.push_back(Point2D(xStart,yStart,FL_BLACK,side, pointNumber++));
00200                 xStart+=xTick;
00201         }
00202 }// drawHorizPoints
00203 
00204 void VehicleDrawWindow::drawPoints(vector<Point2D> points)
00205 {
00206         for (int i = 0; i < points.size(); i++){
00207                 Point2D nextPoint = points.at(i);
00208                 fl_color(nextPoint.getColor());
00209                 fl_circle(nextPoint.getX(),nextPoint.getY(),radius);
00210         }
00211 }
00212 
00213 int VehicleDrawWindow::checkPoint(int pointX, int pointY)
00214 {
00215         for (int i = 0; i < snapPoints.size(); i++){
00216                 Point2D nextPoint = snapPoints.at(i);
00217                 if(inMargin(nextPoint.getX(),pointX,margin) && inMargin(nextPoint.getY(),pointY,margin))
00218                 {
00219                         return i;
00220                 }
00221         }
00222         return -1;
00223 }
00224 
00225 bool VehicleDrawWindow::inMargin(int point1, int point2, int pointMargin)
00226 {
00227         int diff = abs(point1-point2);
00228         if(diff < pointMargin)
00229         {
00230                 return true;
00231         }else{
00232                 return false;
00233         }
00234 }

00236 void VehicleDrawWindow::resetPoints(vector<Point2D> &points)
00237 {
00238         for (int i = 0; i < points.size(); i++){
00239                 points.at(i).setColor(FL_BLACK);
00240 
00241         }
00242 }

00246 void VehicleDrawWindow::addShape(Point2D p){
00247 
00248         if(currentShape == "Light"){
00249                 vector<LineSegment> light;
00250                 light.push_back(LineSegment(0,0,0,8,0,0));
00251                 light.push_back(LineSegment(0,8,-8,16,0,0));
00252                 light.push_back(LineSegment(0,8,8,16,0,0));
00253                 shapes.push_back(Shape(light,p,currentShape));
00254 
00255         }
00256         if(currentShape == "Sound"){
00257                 vector<LineSegment> light;
00258                 light.push_back(LineSegment(0,0,0,8,0,0));
00259                 light.push_back(LineSegment(-4,8,0,8,0,0));
00260                 light.push_back(LineSegment(-4,8,-4,16,0,0));
00261                 light.push_back(LineSegment(4,8,0,8,0,0));
00262                 light.push_back(LineSegment(4,8,4,16,0,0));
00263                 shapes.push_back(Shape(light,p,currentShape));
00264 
00265         }
00266         if(currentShape == "Motor"){
00267                 vector<LineSegment> light;
00268                 light.push_back(LineSegment(-8,0,-8,16,0,0));
00269                 light.push_back(LineSegment(8,0,8,16,0,0));
00270                 light.push_back(LineSegment(-8,16,8,16,0,0));
00271                 shapes.push_back(Shape(light,p,currentShape));
00272 
00273         }
00274         this->redraw();
00275 }
